problem_text:
Is there a constant δ with 0 < δ < 1 and an integer N such that whenever A, B, and C are conjugacy classes in the alternating group Alt(n) each of size at least |Alt(n)|δ with n ⩾ N, then ABC = Alt(n)?
M. Garonzi, A. Mar´oti
answer: Yes, there are (D. Dona, Preprint, 2025, https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.06012).
